property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, you may examine the top 2 cards of the location deck and return them in any order. If undefeated, you may banish this barrier.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, you are dealt 1d4 Combat damage; each other character at this location is dealt 1 Combat damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, you may draw 1 random weapon, item, armor or spell (your choice) from the box and add it to your hand. If undefeated you are dealt 1d4 Combat damage; discard 1 card from the top of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, add 1d4+1 random weapons with the Ranged trait from the box to your hand. If undefeated, you may banish this barrier.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Damage dealt by Crowfood is increased by 2. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, each character at this location must succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 10 check or be dealt 1d4 Electricity damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter the Ogrekin, roll 1d4: 1. The difficulty to defeat the Ogrekin is increased by 2; damage dealt by the Ogrekin is reduced by 2. 2. Damage dealt by the Ogrekin is increased by 2. 3. The Ogrekin may not be evaded. 4. After the encounter, put the Ogrekin on the bottom of the location deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 8 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. When you are dealt damage by the Hag, you must first choose spells to discard as your damage, if you have any. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you are the only character at this location, the difficulty to defeat Kaven is increased by 2. If undefeated, instead of normal damage, Kaven deals 1d4+1 Combat damage to you; banish this card. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, the Kreeg Ogre deals 1 Combat damage to each other character at this location. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Lamatar is immune to the Cold, Mental and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, Lamatar is undefeated. Before the encounter, Lamatar deals 1d4-1 Cold damage to a character of your choice at this location. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Lucrecia is immune to the Mental trait. Before the encounter, Lucrecia deals 1d4-1 Force damage to a character of your choice at this location. Any characater dealt damage by Lucrecia also buries 1 random card from his discard pile. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, each other character at this location summons and encounters a Kreeg Ogre henchman. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, return the Nightbelly Boa faceup to the top of this location deck. Defeating the Nightbelly Boa does not allow you to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you defeat the Hound, the difficulty to defeat Ruckus is decreased by 2. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After the encounter, roll 1d6. On a 1, a character of your choice at this location summons and encounters a Graul Ogrekin henchman. If undefeated, damage dealt by the Donkey Rats is reduced to 1.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Add 1d8 to checks to defeat Grazuul with the Fire trait. If the check to defeat does not have either the Fire trait or the Acid trait, Grazuul is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Muck Graul is immune to the Acid trait. Add 1 die to checks to defeat Muck Graul with the Fire trait. If the check to defeat does not have the Fire trait, Muck is undefeated. If undefeated, choose a random character at this location to encounter Muck; after that encounter, put Muck on the bottom of the location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Myriana is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, Myriana is undefeated. If undefeated, after the encounter, reset your hand and end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, the Ogre deals 1 Combat damage dealt to each other character at this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter the Ogrekin, roll 1d4: 1. The difficulty to defeat the Ogrekin is increased by 2; damage dealt by the Ogrekin is reduced by 1. 2. Damage dealt by the Ogrekin is increased by 2. 3. The Ogrekin may not be evaded. 4. After the encounter, put the Ogrekin on the bottom of the location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 7 check or when you take damage, discard cards from the top of your deck instead of your hand; this damage may not be reduced.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After the first check, discard 1 random card from your hand, then reset your hand. Damage dealt by Barl is dealt to each character at this location. All damage dealt by Barl is Fire damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Black Magga may not be evaded, and is immune to the Mental trait. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. After the encounter, each character at this location attempts a Wisdom 9 check. Characters who succeed recharge 1d4 cards of their choice; characters who fail discard 1d4 cards of their choice.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "You're a pretty one. Come kiss my hook!" --Jaagrath Kreeg

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, Jaagrath Kreek deals 1 Combat damage to each other character at your location. If your character has the human trait, the difficulty of checks to defeat Jaagrath is increased by 2. If undefeated, Jaagrath Kreeg deals 1 Combat damage to each other character at your location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Up every mornin', choppin' on the face stones, Bosses make the rains come down! Dam's 'bout to tumble, waters gonna rumble, Glad I don't live 'round in town!" --Malugus Kreeg's wreckin' song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, Malugus Kreeg deals 1 Combat damage to each other character at this location; then move each character at this location to a random other location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Is that you, butter knuckles? Climb on over your brothers and give Mammy a squeeze!"

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, each character at this location summons and encounters an Ancient Skeleton henchman. The first time in this scenario that anyone would defeat Mammy Graul, she is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d6+1 to your Perception, Dexterity or Ranged check. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 2 to your check to recharge a spell. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to move. You automatically succeed at any check required to move. You may not play this ally during an encounter. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d4 to another character's combat check, or 2d4 to another character's combat check against a monster with the Giant trait. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to succeed at your check to acquire an item or weapon. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d4 to your combat check, or 2d4 to your combat check against a monster with the Giant trait. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to attempt a Charisma or Diplomacy 6 check; if you succeed, evade a monster whose highest difficulty to defeat is 18 or lower. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 4. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon with the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Discard this card to add 1d4 and the Ranged and Magic traits to your combat check. Reveal this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. If you are proficient with light armors , you may play another armor on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to a check to acquire a boon. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Bury any card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: If the top card of the blessing discard pile matches this card, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 to your Strength check. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 to your Dexterity check. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 to your Charisma ckeck. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, bury this card to roll 4d6 and add the Fire and Ranged traits.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 8 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 to your Intelligence check. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 4.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 9 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to decrease the difficulty of a combat check by 2d4, or 1d4+4 if you have the Arcane skill.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 8 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Place this card in front of you when a character encounters a bane. Any character who encounters a monster this turn adds 2d4 with the Fire trait to her combat check. Discard this card at the end of this turn. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card and choose a character at your location. Shuffle 1d4+1 random cards from his discard pile into his deck and 1 random card from your discard pile into your deck, then discard this card. If you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at a Divine 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to choose a type of card and examine the top 3 cards of a location deck. If there are any cards of the chosen type, set them aside. Shuffle the remaining cards into the deck, then put the cards you set aside together in any order at either the top or the bottom of the deck. If you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 12 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to decrease the difficulty of a combat check by 3. If your character is attempting the check, you may roll your Arcane or Divine die + 1d8 for your combat check. Discard this card to succeed at your check to acquire a weapon, an armor, or an item. If you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Dexterity or Ranged die + your unmodified Strength die + 1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6 with the Cold trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 with the Cold trait to a combat check at another location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d8+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Dexterity or Ranged + 1d4+2; you may additionally recharge this card to add another 1d12 with the Poison trait. When playing another weapon, you may discard this card to add 1d4+2 with the Poison trait to the combat check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card and discard another card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d8+3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8+3. When you play this weapon, take 1 Force damage that may not be reduced.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 2 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: You may not move or be moved from this location unless another character is present.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Bury 1d4 cards of your choice from your hand. If you don't have enough cards in your hand to do so, bury any remaining cards from the top of your deck instead.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Despite its unfathomable age and the unbelievable size of the blocks that went into its construction, this immense dam barely holds back the flood of rain-swollen water. While the dam largely seems to be holding, gaps in the massive masonry send torrents of water blasting into the air and crashing into the river below. The thunder of countless tons of rushing water is nearly deafening.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 2 Item 0 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you attempt a combat check, you may discard an ally to add 1d4 to that check.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Strength 8 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, you may shuffle any allies in your discard pile into your character deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This battle-worn but still sturdy looking fort towers over the bleak landscape stretching between the mountains and Kreegwood. With its back to the sheer cliffs of the Wyvern Mountains, the fortifications look impregnable. Yet despite the fort's significant defenses, no one appears to be manning the walls, and the stillness within suggests that the fort has been deserted.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 0 Spell 2 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 2 Blessing 2

property.name: Attr2
property.value: You must succeed at a Wisdom or Divine 7 check to move or be moved to another location.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Wisdom or Divine 8 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: For the rest of the scenario, characters at this location may choose not to reset their hands.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The swamp known as the Shimmerglens is said to be haunted by nixies, nymphs, and even more dangerous fey. The paths through the mire endlessly shift as if trying to trap trespassers.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Characters at this location may choose not to reset their hands.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 0 Spell 1 Armor 0 Item 2 Ally 2 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may move.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Banish an item.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a random item from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A remote village in the shadow of Hook Mountain, Turtleback Ferry has long borne the brunt of violence from a nearby ogre tribe. Most villagers have long since fled to safer havens.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may move.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may move.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: No one has heard from the rangers of Fort Rannick for months, and the lord-mayor of Magnimar fears the worst. Investigating the fate of the lost rangers leads to the homestead of the monstrously inbred Graul half-ogres, and then the Kreeg clan of ogres, who have taken over the fort. Saving the fort reveals a stonehearted warlord manipulating the ogres, threatening to destroy the ancient dam of Skull's Crossing and sacrifice the town of Turtleback Ferry in the name of a mysterious master.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Them Ogres Ain't Right The Fort in Peril Here Comes the Flood Battle at the Dam Into the Mountains

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character chooses a role card and gains a power feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The destruction of Skull's Crossing wasn't just some random accident. More ogres have been at work destroying the gigantic dam, imperiling all of the lands downriver. Put a stop to the ogre demolitionists and find out why their boss, Malugus Kreeg, is on a rampage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Dam Shimmerglens Garrison Guard Tower Prison Treacherous Cave Waterfront Mountain Peak

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Dam may not be temporarily closed.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Malugus Kreeg

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Kreeg Ogres

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Terrible, unnatural rains have flooded Turtleback Ferry, a village near Fort Rannick. Things get even worse when the nearby dam of Skull's Crossing bursts, spilling the legendary terror Black Magga into the village. Save everyone you can before the moster consumes everything!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Turtleback Ferry Academy Village House Woods Waterfront General Store Dam Treacherous Cove

property.name: Attr1
property.value:
Place the villain Black Magga faceup next to the blessings deck. Shuffle all of the cards in the Henchmen list into a single stack and deal 3 into each location deck.
At the start of each turn, select a random location deck and put its bottom 1d4 cards facedown under Black Magga without looking at them.
When you acquire an ally, put it under this card.
When either the blessings deck or all of the location decks have no cards remaining, if the number of allies under this card is at least equal to the number of allies under Black Magga, you win the scenario.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Per Location: 1 Nightbelly Boa, 1 Random Blessing, 1 Random Ally

property.name: Attr4
property.value: All the allies under this card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Malugus revealed that the ogre clanhold at Hook Mountain has been overrun! Journey through swamps, ruins and dungeons to put an end to the ogres' tyrannical new leader, the stone giant necromancer Barl Breakbones, who will eagerly sacrifice his allies to fuel his evil magic!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Mountain Peak Shrine to Lamashtu Shimmerglens Woods Desecrated Vault Thassilonian Dungeon Temple Deeper Dungeons

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you defeat a henchman, place it in a stack next to this card. When the third henchman is placed on the stack, each character is dealt 1d6 Force damage.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Barl Breakbones

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Lamatar Bayden Lunderbud Hook Mountain Hags

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Headband of Vast Intelligence, Sihedron Medallion, Wand of Enervation

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Fort Rannick, holdfast of the Black Arrow rangers, has been overrun by ogres! Take back the fort from the brutal Kreeg clan of ogres, uncover their sinister allies, and put an end to their brutal leader, the dreaded "pappy" Jaagrath Kreeg!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Fort Rannick City Gate Guard Tower Garrison Warrens Prison Deeper Dungeons Mountain Peak

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty of checks to acquire allies is decreased by 3.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Jaagrath Kreeg

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Lucrecia Dorella and Hookmaw Kreeg Kaven Windstrike Kreeg Ogres

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Contact has been lost with the guardians of Varisia's frontiers, the Black Arrows of Fort Rannick. The search for the missing rangers reveals the homestead of an inbread family of brutal ogrekin. Put an end to these cruel dullards and their corpulent mother, Mammy Graul

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Wooden Bridge Turtleback Ferry Farmhouse Woods Village House Waterfront General Store Prison

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you defeat a henchman, place it in a stack next to this card. The difficulty to defeat Mammy Graul is increased by 1 per card in this stack.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Mammy Graul

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Ruckus Graul and Hound Crowfood Graul Graul Ogrekin

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat.
